nodes.text: Cerean was the official language of the planet Cerea. It was mainly spoken by native Cereans. Despite their isolationist stance, the Cereans also learned to speak Basic, teaching it during childhood.
"Chu'unthor" was the Cerean word for "academy," and the word "Barsen'thor" translated to "Warden of the Order."

Many non-Cereans learned to speak the language, including Follnor Callat, Miltar Dolor, and Angela Krin. Cerean was taught to many members of the Jedi Order, such as Qui-Gon Jinn, Yarael Poof, Oppo Rancisis, and Grand Master Yoda.
